news.title: Team Australia has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Hong Kong has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Japan has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Taiwan has registered for the Asian Cup 2025

news.description:
🇦🇺 Australia played a friendly match against 🇺🇾 Uruguay as part of their preparation for Asian Cup 2025.
Final score: 4–3 (9–6)
news.title: Australia defeats Uruguay 4–3 in a friendly ahead of Asian Cup 2025
Team Thailand has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team China has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Malaysia has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Vietnam has registered for the Asian Cup 2025

news.description: Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 will take place on August 2nd at 14:00 UTC (22:00 UTC+8) on the WTCOC Discord
news.short_title: Asian Cup draw: Aug 2 on Discord
news.title: Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 to be held on August 2nd at 22h UTC+8
Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 has been completed

news.description: The first match of Asian Cup 2025 is set! Last year's champion 🇭🇰 Hong Kong will face 🇦🇺 Australia on Sunday at 11:00 UTC (19h UTC+8)
news.title: First match of Asian Cup 2025 scheduled: Hong Kong vs Australia this Sunday

news.description:
All Round 1 matches of the Asian Cup 2025 have been scheduled! All 4 matches
🇹🇼 vs 🇻🇳
🇹🇭 vs 🇲🇾
🇦🇺 vs 🇭🇰
🇯🇵 vs 🇨🇳
will be played on Saturday and Sunday
news.title: All Round 1 matches of Asian Cup 2025 are scheduled for this weekend

news.description: In Round 1 of Group A at the Asian Cup 2025, 🇹🇼 Taiwan defeated 🇻🇳 Vietnam 5–0 (10–0), while 🇹🇭 Thailand beat 🇲🇾 Malaysia 4–1 (8–4)
news.title: Taiwan and Thailand claim strong wins in Asian Cup 2025 Round 1 Group A

news.description: The reigning Asian Cup 2024 champion 🇭🇰 Hong Kong defeated 🇦🇺 Australia 4–1 (8–2)
news.title: Reigning Asian Cup champion Hong Kong wins in Round 1

news.description: In an exciting clash of WTCOC champions, five-time winners 🇯🇵 Japan defeated one-time winners 🇨🇳 China 3–2 (7–6)
news.title: In WTCOC champions clash, Japan claims victory
Asian Cup 2025 Round 1 completed

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan has all but secured a playoff berth after defeating last year’s Asian Cup champions 🇭🇰 Hong Kong in Round 2 3–2 (6–5)
news.title: Japan defeats Hong Kong to secure playoff spot at Asian Cup 2025
Asian Cup 2025 Round 2 completed

news.description: 🇹🇼 Taiwan guaranteed a place in the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after defeating 🇲🇾 Malaysia in Round 2 5–0 (10–2). With two wins, Taiwan is already through!
news.title: Taiwan secures semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025

news.description: 🇹🇭 Thailand guaranteed a place in the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after beating 🇻🇳 Vietnam in Round 2 3–2 (7–5). With two wins, Thailand is already through!
news.title: Thailand secures semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025

news.description: 🇭🇰 Hong Kong claimed the final ticket to the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after defeating 🇨🇳 China in the last round 3–2 (7–5)
news.title: Hong Kong clinches last semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025
Asian Cup 2025 group stage completed — semifinalists decided

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan marches towards another trophy, defeating 🇹🇼 Taiwan in the semifinal 4–1 (8–4) to book their place in the final of the Asian Cup 2025
news.title: Japan beats Taiwan to advance to Asian Cup 2025 final

news.description: 🇹🇭 Thailand reached the final of the Asian Cup 2025 after a dramatic semifinal win over 🇭🇰 Hong Kong 3–2 (7–4)
news.title: Thailand defeats Hong Kong in semifinal to reach Asian Cup 2025 final

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan are the Asian Cup 2025 champions! In a thrilling final they defeated 🇹🇭 Thailand 3–2 (7–6). Thailand finishes as silver medalist for the second year in a row.
news.title: Japan crowned Asian Cup 2025 champion after dramatic final

news.description:
🇯🇵 Japan has done it again! With 5 wins out of 6 WTCOC editions, they cement a true era of dominance ☀️
In the final, Japan defeated 🇨🇱 Chile 4–1.

🏆 Japan 🇯🇵
🥈 Chile 🇨🇱
🥉 Ukraine 🇺🇦

Details: WTCOC 2025
news.title: Japan crowned five-time World Team Carcassonne Champions

news.description:
A new format for CCL 2026 has been announced! The league stage will be replaced by a group stage. More details coming soon.
See here: CCL 2026
news.title: New format announced for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇱🇻 Aleksejs Pegusevs has won the online Carcassonne Olympics for the second time! A total of 201 players competed, and now we eagerly await his appearance at the World Cup in Herne 2025.

🥇 Aleksejs Pegusevs (Alexey_LV) 🇱🇻
🥈 Zvonimir Vlaic (Bluste) 🇭🇷
🥉 Pavel Hudec (posij 118) 🇨🇿

More details: MSO 2025
news.title: Aleksejs Pegusevs wins Carcassonne at MSO Grand Prix 2025

news.description:
The all-time ELO record in Carcassonne has been broken once again 🎉 Congratulations to 🇱🇻 Alexey Pegushev for setting a new milestone.

With players continuously pushing the limits, the 900 ELO mark is now within reach. The question remains — who will be the first to achieve it?
news.title: New All-Time ELO Record set by Alexey Pegushev

news.description: 🇦🇷 Matias Carrizo (maticarrizoc) has won the first season of the Argentine Carcassonne League 2025 and earned a ticket to the Qualification of CCL 2026. In the decisive match, he defeated Academia47 2–1.
news.title: Matias Carrizo wins first season of Argentine Carcassonne League 2025

news.description:
The 2025 Peak ELO has been updated in the Carcassonne Masters list.
See here: Masters
news.title: 2025 Peak ELO rankings updated in Carcassonne Masters list

news.description:
The ETCOC 2025 draw will be held on October 15 at 19:00 utc in Discord.
Join here: ETCOC Discord
news.title: ETCOC 2025 draw to take place on October 15

news.description:
The ETCOC 2025 draw has been completed!

Group A: 🇫🇮 Finland, 🇫🇷 France, 🇵🇹 Portugal, Tutejšyja, 🇺🇦 Ukraine
Group B: 🇩🇪 Germany, 🇭🇺 Hungary, 🇱🇻 Latvia, RCP, 🇷🇴 Romania
Group C: Catalonia, 🇭🇷 Croatia, 🇨🇿 Czech Republic, 🇮🇹 Italy, 🇵🇱 Poland
Group D: 🇬🇷 Greece, 🇪🇸 Spain, 🇬🇧 United Kingdom, 🇵🇱 Poland
news.title: ETCOC 2025 group stage draw completed

news.description: A new association filter has been added to the ETCOC 2025 Main matches list — making it easier to view games by team.
news.short_title: Association filter on the Main page
news.title: Association filter added to ETCOC 2025 Main matches list

news.description:
RCP are the ETCOC 2025 champions! 🎉
Final: 🇵🇱 Poland - RCP 2–3 (5–8)
3rd place match: 🇺🇦 Ukraine - 🇧🇪 Belgium 3–2 (7–6)

🏆 RCP
🥈 Poland 🇵🇱
🥉 Ukraine 🇺🇦
news.title: RCP crowned ETCOC 2025 champions

news.description:
The Association Coefficients 2025 have been updated and are now final. This ranking will determine the number of spots for each association in CCL 2026.
See details: Association Ranking 2025
news.title: Association Coefficients 2025 updated and finalized

news.description:
🇨🇳 Xiangyu Qin is the Carcassonne World Champion 2025! 🏆
The final tournament took place on October 25 in Herne, Germany, featuring 52 players from 45 associations.

Final: 🇺🇾 Horatio Mastandrea 108 – 135 🇨🇳 Xiangyu Qin
3rd place: 🇱🇻 Aleksejs Peguševs 74 – 84 🇧🇪 Raf Mesotten

Winners:
🥇 Xiangyu Qin 🇨🇳
🥈 Horatio Mastandrea 🇺🇾
🥉 Raf Mesotten 🇧🇪
news.title: Xiangyu Qin wins the Carcassonne World Championship 2025

news.description:
Registration for the Carcassonne Champions League 2026 is now open! 🏆
Deadlines:
– Q1 & Q2 (association ranking): November 16
– Q3 (other tournament winners): November 9
– Q4 (Peak 2025 Elo selection): November 17–21

Register here: CCL 2026
news.title: Registration for Carcassonne Champions League 2026 is now open

news.description:
The Fans Choice event for CCL 2026 has started! Fans will decide which countries receive two additional spots in the Qualification 3 stage.

From November 3–7, voting takes place on carcassonne.gg to select 4 countries from all candidates.
From November 8–9, 2 associations will be chosen on Instagram to get the extra Qualification 3 spots.
Finally, from November 10–11, each of these 2 associations will hold its own vote to select the player who will represent their country.
news.title: Fans Choice for Carcassonne Champions League 2026 has started

news.description:
Fans Choice Stage 1 is complete! Congratulations to 🇦🇷 Argentina, 🇪🇸 Spain, 🇵🇹 Portugal, and 🇭🇺 Hungary for advancing to Stage 2.
Stage 2 voting will take place on our Instagram page carcassonne.gg from November 8, 18:00 to November 9, 18:00 UTC.
news.title: Fans Choice Stage 1 completed — four countries advance

news.description:
Argentina and Portugal have won the Fans Choice vote and will receive additional spots in CCL 2026 Qualification 3.

Results:
🇦🇷 Argentina - 42%
🇵🇹 Portugal - 28%
🇪🇸 Spain - 26%
🇭🇺 Hungary - 4%
news.title: Argentina and Portugal win Fans Choice vote for CCL 2026

news.description:
🇫🇮 The Finland association has registered for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage, Lauri Larpaattori will represent Finland as the winner of OCFC 2025.
In Qualification 1, Jonne Noppasakki will compete as the bronze medalist of the online championship.
It’s also expected that Otto Nallerheim will join Qualification 4 for Top Elo players.
news.title: Finland’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇳🇴 The Norway association has registered for CCL 2026.
In the tournament will play Hanne Panzah (winner of the Norwegian Championship 2025) and Hogne hognej (runner-up). Both will compete in Qualification 2.
news.title: Norway’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇯🇵 The Japan association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In Qualification 1 will play Yuya snow_island, selected by a vote among Japanese players.
In Qualification 3 will play Satoshi Kithara as the winner of the King of Carcassonne Tournament of Champions 2025.
Two players for the Main Stage will be determined through an online tournament: details.
The association declined the additional Q3 spot earned through victories in WTCOC and Asian Cup 2025, expecting that RabbitRain will join Qualification 4 for Top Elo players.
news.title: Japan’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇺🇾 The Uruguay association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In Qualification 2 will play Martín BDDL1 and Bernardo berna_uy, both winners of online tournaments.
In Qualification 3 will play Horacio The Alchimist, invited as the World Cup 2025 runner-up.
news.title: Uruguay’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇭🇰 The Hong Kong association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Carman CTCTCTCTCT, winner of the HK Summer 2025: details.
In Qualification 1 will play Tung Sunny369, silver medalist of HK Summer 2025.
In Qualification 3 (spot earned by Hong Kong for their bronze medal at Asian Cup 2025) will play Ernie ernie012, bronze medalist of HK Summer 2025.
news.title: Hong Kong’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇧🇪 The Belgium association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Fabian FabianM_be, winner of BCOC 2025: details.
In Qualification 1 will play Raf CraftyRaf, runner-up of BCOC 2025.
In Qualification 3 (spot earned by Belgium for their 4th place at ETCOC 2025) will play Tom Nicedicer, 3rd place at BCOC 2025.
news.title: Belgium’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇨🇿 The Czech Republic association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Martin martypartyouje, winner of CzONC-2025: details.
In Qualification 1 will play Pavel posij118 and Michal majkls, who finished 2nd and 3rd in CzONC-2025.
news.title: Czech Republic’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇹🇼 The Taiwan association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Min-Wei HotlyHotly, winner of TWCOC-2025: details.
In Qualification 1 will play Po-Chun StevenChangTW.
news.title: Taiwan’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇭🇺 The Hungary association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Kocsis-Bakti mosopal, winner of MOCB 2025: details.
In Qualification 1 will play Kertész David44, silver medalist of MOCB 2025.
news.title: Hungary’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
🇱🇹 The Lithuania association has confirmed its players for CCL 2026.
In the Main Stage will play Audrius Kreukle, selected by the team through an internal 1×1 mini-tournament.
In Qualification 1 will play Kestutis KurKestutis.
news.title: Lithuania’s players for Carcassonne Champions League 2026

news.description:
The draw for Qualification 3 — the path for winners of other international tournaments — has been completed. Sixteen players from fourteen countries have learned their opponents.
Match list: CCL 2026 Qualifications
news.title: Qualification 3 draw completed for CCL 2026

news.description:
A new country filter has been added to the CCL 2026 Qualifications page. You can now quickly view all groups that include players from a selected association.
Try it here: CCL 2026 Qualifications
news.title: Country filter added to CCL 2026 Qualifications page

news.description:
The draws for Qualification Paths Q1, Q2, and Q4 have been completed. A total of 78 players have learned their opponents and qualification groups.
Matches will begin on 24 November.
See all matches here: CCL 2026 Qualifications
news.title: Draw completed for Qualification Paths Q1, Q2, and Q4 of CCL 2026

news.description: The CCL 2026 Qualification groups have been updated with match numbers. Each group now also shows which Lower Bracket match a player moves to after losing in the Upper Bracket, making the bracket structure clearer and easier to follow.
news.short_title: Match numbers added to CCL 2026 Qualification groups
news.title: Match numbers added
